data.name: Breakthrough
data.detailed_description:
Hi i am Faith, the solo developer and artist behind Breakthrough.

Breakthrough is a fast paced roguelike-shooter with high-risk high-rewards mechanics.
With a very high difficulty, it is designed for thoses seeking a great challenge.
You will loot plenty of random items and projectiles, but luck is not predominant in Breakthrough. There is always a choice to make regarding the build you have, either by trading, buying or picking spells.
Very fast loading time enable for seamless iteration of runs.

In this game you will find:

  • Epic boss fight
  • Bullet-hell gameplay
  • Easy to learn, hard to master
  • Speedrun friendly (runs history, save your favorites)
  • Various builds through items and spells
  • Uniques art & musics

data.short_description: Breakthrough is an hardcore roguelike-shooter with high risk/rewards mechanics. Make your way through the procedurally generated levels by looting, trading, buying items, and upgrading spells. Both balanced and very difficult, Breakthrough will conquer the heart of thoses seeking a great challenge.
